chunk_text: #### What if my wedding start time is earlier in the day? 5 hours - 30 minute ceremony, 1 hour greeting, cocktail & appetizers, 45 minute dinner, 15 minute toasts & first dances, 2 hours dancing & traditional activities (cake cutting, garter toss, bouquet toss, etc), 30 minutes wind down. #### What is a typical wedding and reception time frame? Yes. Music will stop playing at 10 PM. #### Is there a sound ordinance? Yes.
